contentitemdata.k13store.productsku.SKUDescription:
If you are a pro or at least serious about making coffee, the Mazzer Super Jolly DR is a great choice. Luxury cars are powerful and spacious; it's the same with this grinder. It provides you with a large hopper and doser with high-rev strong steel burrs powered by a 350-Watt engine.

Even though it may seem very powerful, engineers constructed the grinder very carefully so that it's also very precise. Pull the dosing lever quickly and a pre-set amount of coffee dispenses into the portafilter. Besides that, any setting you can think of is an easy job for the Mazzer. Choose a drip coffee, an espresso or a French press, and just turn the grind adjustment disc under the hopper.

  • Suitable for drip coffees, espressos, and French presses
  • Lot of possible settings
  • Lever to dispense a pre-set amount of coffee (5.5–9 g)
  • Plastic 2.7 lb (1.2 kg) hopper
  • 0.7 lb (280 g) doser
contentitemdata.k13store.productsku.SKUShortDescription: For those who are serious about making coffee. With a large hopper and doser with high-rev strong steel burrs.
